name: The Unreal Schism
description:
This is the second build of my game! This is the game with additional mechanics, to make gameplay more complex. Art, tutorial, optimization and hopefully randomizing the culprit, soon to come! Please let me know what you think, by filling out the following form below:

https://forms.gle/uqUNaQa56Woe2pqYA

Thank you so much for checking out my game! I hope you have a great day!
